itemLabel: Irene Adams, Baroness Adams of Craigielea

wikipedia_page.main: Katherine Patricia Irene Adams, Baroness Adams of Craigielea (born 27 December 1947) is a Scottish Labour peer who served as the Member of Parliament for Paisley North from 1990 to 2005.

response: *Irene Adams, Baroness Adams of Craigielea (born 1947), Scottish politician
